TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ProcessModelSection extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection
Public NotInheritable Class ProcessModelSection Inherits ConfigurationSection

summary.span: 在網際網路資訊服務 (IIS) Web 伺服器上設定 ASP.NET 處理序模型設定。

span.span: Configures the ASP.NET process model settings on an Internet Information Services (IIS) Web server.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別 (Class) 提供以程式的方法，存取和修改組態檔的 `processModel` 區段。The class provides a way to programmatically access and modify the `processModel` section of a configuration file. 類別控制各方面的 ASP.NET 工作者處理序，包括其存留期間，建立一次什麼樣的安全性識別下，執行的執行個體的數目和大小的 CLR 執行緒集區，以服務要求。The class controls various aspects of the ASP.NET worker process, including its lifetime, the number of instances created at a time, what security identity it runs under, and the size of the CLR thread pool to service requests. ASP.NET 以 IIS 6 執行原生模式時，ASP.NET 會使用 IIS 6 處理序模型，並忽略大部分的設定，這一節。When ASP.NET is running under IIS 6 in native mode, ASP.NET uses the IIS 6 process model and ignores most settings in this section. 使用 IIS 系統管理使用者介面 (UI) 來設定這些屬性。Use the IIS administration user interface (UI) to configure those properties. ASP.NET 仍會使用下列屬性，可以透過組態檔來設定： ， ， ， ， ，和。ASP.NET still uses the following properties, which can be configured through the configuration file: , , , , , and . `processModel`使用受保護的組態功能或工具，因為它由 ASP.NET ISAPI 延伸模組就無法加密 > 一節。The `processModel` section cannot be encrypted using the protected-configuration feature or tools because it is consumed by the ASP.NET ISAPI extension. ## Examples 這個範例示範如何指定以宣告方式的數個屬性的值`processModel`區段，也可以做為成員的存取類別。This example demonstrates how to specify values declaratively for several attributes of the `processModel` section, which can also be accessed as members of the class. 下列組態檔範例示範如何以宣告方式為指定值`processModel`> 一節。The following configuration file example shows how to specify values declaratively for the `processModel` section. ``` ``` 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用類別。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/CS/processmodelsection.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/VB/processmodelsection.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 使用預設值初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using default settings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式不適合直接從您的程式碼使用。The constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code. 它會呼叫 ASP.NET 組態系統。It is called by the ASP.NET configuration system. 取得執行個體類別使用方法。You obtain an instance of the class by using the method.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AutoConfig { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否為 ASP.NET 應用程式自動設定 ASP.NET 效能設定。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether ASP.NET performance settings are automatically configured for ASP.NET applications.

value.span: 如果為 ASP.NET 應用程式自動設定效能設定則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if performance settings are automatically configured for ASP.NET applications; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果值設定為`false`，明確 Web.config 值可用來判斷 ASP.NET 應用程式的效能設定。If the value is set to `false`, explicit Web.config values are used to determine performance configuration for the ASP.NET application. 如果值設定為`true`，ASP.NET 應用程式的自動設定的效能設定。If the value is set to `true`, the performance settings are automatically configured for the ASP.NET application. 值明確設定為`true`Machine.config 檔案中。The value is explicitly set to `true` in the Machine.config file. 預設程式碼的值設定為`false`。The default code value is set to `false`. 如果從 Machine.config 中移除值，而不是自動設定的設定會使用明確的設定。If the value is removed from Machine.config, the explicit settings are used instead of the auto-configured settings.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan ClientConnectedCheck { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，表示要求在佇列中保留的時間長度。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating how long a request is left in the queue.

value.span: 指出佇列時間的 值。

span.span: A value indicating the queuing time.
The default value is 5 seconds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會指定要求的時間之前 ASP.NET 執行用戶端連接檢查，排入佇列。This property specifies how long a request is queued before ASP.NET performs a client connected check. > [!NOTE] > 如果間隔時間過期時要求仍在佇列中，用戶端連接檢查都會之前要求傳遞到 ASP.NET 工作者處理序處理完成。If the interval expires while the request is still queued, a client connected check is done before passing the request over to the ASP.NET worker process for handling. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何存取和修改屬性。The following code example shows how to access and modify the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#18](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/CS/processmodelsection.cs#18)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#18](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/VB/processmodelsection.vb#18)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::Configuration::ProcessModelComAuthenticationLevel ComAuthenticationLevel { System::Web::Configuration::ProcessModelComAuthenticationLevel get(); void set(System::Web::Configuration::ProcessModelComAuthenticationLevel value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，表示 DCOM 安全性的驗證等級。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the level of authentication for DCOM security.
One of the values.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當這個屬性值設定為，DCOM 會決定使用標準的安全性交涉演算法的驗證層級。When this property value is set to , DCOM determines the authentication level using its normal security-negotiation algorithm. 指派給這個屬性，指定在 Machine.config 檔案中，預設值是。The default value assigned to this property, as specified in the Machine.config file, is . 在此情況下，DCOM 用戶端建立與伺服器之間的關係時，才會驗證用戶端憑證。In this case, DCOM authenticates the credentials of the client only when the client establishes a relationship with the server. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何存取 屬性。The following code example shows how to access the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#21](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/CS/processmodelsection.cs#21)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/VB/processmodelsection.vb#21)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::Configuration::ProcessModelComImpersonationLevel ComImpersonationLevel { System::Web::Configuration::ProcessModelComImpersonationLevel get(); void set(System::Web::Configuration::ProcessModelComImpersonationLevel value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，表示 COM 安全性的驗證等級。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the level of authentication for COM security.
One of the values.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當這個屬性值設定為，DCOM 會決定使用標準的安全性交涉演算法的模擬等級。When this property value is set to , DCOM determines the impersonation level using its normal security-negotiation algorithm. 指派給這個屬性，指定在 Machine.config 檔案中，預設值是。The default value assigned to this property, as specified in the Machine.config file, is . 在此情況下，伺服器處理序可模擬用戶端代表用戶端時的安全性內容。In this case, the server process can impersonate the client's security context while acting on behalf of the client. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何存取 屬性。The following code example shows how to access the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#22](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/CS/processmodelsection.cs#22)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#22](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/VB/processmodelsection.vb#22)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int CpuMask { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，表示多處理器伺服器上的哪些處理器有資格執行 ASP.NET 處理序。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating which processors on a multiprocessor server are eligible to run ASP.NET processes.

value.span: 編號，表示要套用的位元模式。

span.span: The number representing the bit pattern to apply.
The default value is 0xFFFFFFFF.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值會指定一個位元模式來指出有權執行 ASP.NET 執行緒的 Cpu。The value specifies a bit pattern that indicates the CPUs eligible to run ASP.NET threads. 如果屬性設定為`true`、限制合格的 Cpu 數目的工作者處理序。If the property is set to `true`, the limits worker processes to the number of eligible CPUs. 允許的背景工作處理序數目上限等於 Cpu 數目。The maximum allowed number of worker processes is equal to the number of CPUs. 根據預設，會啟用所有 Cpu 和 ASP.NET 啟動的每一 CPU 的其中一個處理序。By default, all CPUs are enabled and ASP.NET launches one process for each CPU. 如果屬性設定為`false`、屬性會被忽略，而且只有一個背景工作處理序會執行。If the property is set to `false`, the attribute is ignored and only one worker process will run. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何存取 屬性。The following code example shows how to access the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#25](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/CS/processmodelsection.cs#25)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#25](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/VB/processmodelsection.vb#25)]

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property ElementProperty As ConfigurationElementProperty
public: property bool Enable { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否啟用處理序模型。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the process model is enabled.

value.span: 如果啟用處理序模型則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the process model is enabled; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指定是否要將 ASP.NET 裝載外部的工作者處理序中。The property specifies whether ASP.NET is hosted in an external worker process. 如果是`true`、 ASP.NET 裝載外部的工作者處理序中; 否則它會直接在 Inetinfo.exe 中執行。If is `true`, ASP.NET is hosted in an external worker process; otherwise, it runs directly in Inetinfo.exe. > [!NOTE] > 不建議在 Inetinfo.exe 中執行 ASP.NET，因為這項作業包括本機系統的安全性內容中執行應用程式。Running ASP.NET in Inetinfo.exe is not recommended, because this involves running the application in the Local System security context. 當 ASP.NET 執行網際網路資訊服務 (IIS) 6 原生模式時，會忽略此設定，因此通常不需要將它設定為`false`。When ASP.NET runs in Internet Information Services (IIS) 6 native mode, this setting is ignored, so there is usually no reason to set it to `false`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何存取 屬性。The following code example shows how to access the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/CS/processmodelsection.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/VB/processmodelsection.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan IdleTimeout { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，表示閒置時間，在這個期間之後，ASP.NET 會自動結束背景工作處理序。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the period of inactivity after which ASP.NET automatically ends the worker process.
A value indicating the idle time.

value.span: 預設值為 Infinite，這個值與 對應。

span.span: The default value is Infinite, which corresponds to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 工作者處理序重新啟動 （跳回） 當達到屬性值。The worker process is restarted (bounced) when the property value is reached. 根據預設，只有兩個條件會造成處理序彈回： 處理序超過允許的記憶體限制，或處理序超出允許的可排入佇列的要求數目。By default, only two conditions cause the process to bounce: the process exceeds the allowed memory limit, or the process exceeds the allowed number of requests that can be queued. 您可以加入其他條件為預設值。You can add other conditions to the default ones. 例如，您可以使用屬性來限制工作者處理序處於閒置狀態的時間。For example, you can use the property to limit the time the worker process is idle. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何存取 屬性。The following code example shows how to access the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/CS/processmodelsection.cs#16)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#16](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/VB/processmodelsection.vb#16)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::Configuration::ProcessModelLogLevel LogLevel { System::Web::Configuration::ProcessModelLogLevel get(); void set(System::Web::Configuration::ProcessModelLogLevel value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，表示要記錄至事件記錄檔的事件類型。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the event types to be logged to the event log.
One of the values.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 正確使用這個屬性，您可以篩選系統可以記錄的錯誤。By using this property correctly, you can filter the errors the system can log. 了解應用程式的功能問題或瓶頸之後，您可能想要設計策略，以縮小的錯誤您感興趣的範圍。After you have an idea of the application's malfunctions or bottlenecks, you might want to devise a strategy that narrows the range of errors you are interested in. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何存取 屬性。The following code example shows how to access the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#23](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/CS/processmodelsection.cs#23)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#23](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/VB/processmodelsection.vb#23)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxAppDomains { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定一個處理序中所允許的應用程式網域最大數目。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum allowed number of application domains in one process.

value.span: 一個處理序中所允許的應用程式網域最大數目。

span.span: The maximum allowed number of application domains in one process.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果超過臨界值時，如果必須啟動新的應用程式定義域，關閉少使用的應用程式定義域。If the threshold is exceeded, the least-used application domain is shut down if a new application domain must start. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何存取 屬性。The following code example shows how to access the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#27](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/CS/processmodelsection.cs#27)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#27](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/VB/processmodelsection.vb#27)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxIOThreads { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，表示 CLR 執行緒集區中每個 CPU 之 I/O 執行緒的最大數目。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the maximum number of I/O threads per CPU in the CLR thread pool.
The maximum number of threads.
The default is 20.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值必須等於或大於中設定`httpRuntime`組態區段。The value of must be equal to or greater than the setting in the `httpRuntime` configuration section. 您可以有一些控制的 CPU 使用率設定工作者執行緒和 I/O 執行緒數目使用屬性和屬性分別。You can have some control over the CPU utilization by setting the number of worker threads and I/O threads, using the property and the property respectively. 兩種執行緒之間的差異是，後者會繫結 I/O 物件，例如資料流或管道，而前者為傳統的無限制的執行緒。The difference between the two types of threads is that the latter are bound to I/O objects, such as a stream or a pipe, and the former are traditional unrestricted threads. 為網際網路資訊服務 (IIS) 6.0 版和更新版本，在 ASP.NET 處理背景工作執行緒上的要求。For Internet Information Services (IIS) version 6.0 and later, ASP.NET processes requests on worker threads. 這是因為 ASP.NET 整合在 IIS 中。This is because ASP.NET is integrated within IIS. 這些執行緒會從屬於應用程式的整個處理序的 CLR 執行緒集區取得。These threads are obtained from the process-wide CLR thread pool belonging to an application. > [!NOTE] > 通常足以保留 CPU 使用率過高所允許之執行緒的預設值。Usually the default values for the allowed threads are sufficient to keep the CPU utilization high. 如果基於某些原因您的應用程式變慢，可能在等待外部資源，您可以嘗試增加的值小於 100 的執行緒數目。If for some reason your application is slow, perhaps waiting for external resources, you could try to increase the number of threads to a value less than 100. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何存取 屬性。The following code example shows how to access the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/CS/processmodelsection.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/VB/processmodelsection.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxWorkerThreads { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，表示 CLR 執行緒集區中每個 CPU 的背景工作執行緒最大數目。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the maximum amount of worker threads per CPU in the CLR thread pool.
The maximum number of threads.
The default is 20.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值必須等於或大於中設定`httpRuntime`組態區段。The value of must be equal to or greater than the setting in the `httpRuntime` configuration section. 您可以有一些控制的 CPU 使用率設定工作者執行緒和 I/O 執行緒數目使用屬性，屬性，分別。You can have some control over the CPU utilization by setting the number of worker threads and I/O threads, using the property and, the property, respectively. 兩種執行緒之間的差異是，後者會繫結 I/O 物件，例如資料流或管道，而前者為傳統的無限制的執行緒。The difference between the two types of threads is that the latter are bound to I/O objects, such as a stream or a pipe, and the former are traditional unrestricted threads. 為網際網路資訊服務 (IIS) 6.0 版和更高版本，在 ASP.NET 處理背景工作執行緒上的要求。For Internet Information Services (IIS) version 6.0 and higher, ASP.NET processes requests on worker threads. 這是因為 ASP.NET 整合在 IIS 中。This is because ASP.NET is integrated within IIS. 這些執行緒會從屬於應用程式的整個處理序的 CLR 執行緒集區取得。These threads are obtained from the process-wide CLR thread pool belonging to an application. > [!NOTE] > 通常足以保留 CPU 使用率過高所允許之執行緒的預設值。Usually the default values for the allowed threads are sufficient to keep the CPU utilization high. 如果基於某些原因您的應用程式變慢，可能在等待外部資源，您可以嘗試增加的值小於 100 的執行緒數目。If for some reason your application is slow, perhaps waiting for external resources, you could try to increase the number of threads to a value less than 100. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何存取 屬性。The following code example shows how to access the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/CS/processmodelsection.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/VB/processmodelsection.vb#7)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MemoryLimit { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，表示所允許的記憶體大小最大值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the maximum allowed memory size.

value.span: 總系統記憶體的百分比。

span.span: The percentage of the total system memory.
The default is 60 percent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 系統記憶體總數的百分比表示的記憶體大小。The memory size is expressed as a percentage of the total system memory. 這是背景工作處理序可以取用 ASP.NET 重新啟動 （彈回） 之前的記憶體數量它。This is the amount of memory a worker process can consume before ASP.NET restarts (bounces) it. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何存取 屬性。The following code example shows how to access the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/CS/processmodelsection.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/VB/processmodelsection.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MinIOThreads { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 CLR 執行緒集區中每個 CPU 之 I/O 執行緒的最小數目。

span.span: Gets or sets the minimum number of I/O threads per CPU in the CLR thread pool.

value.span: CLR 執行緒集區中每個 CPU 之 I/O 執行緒的最小數目。

span.span: The minimum number of I/O threads per CPU in the CLR thread pool.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何存取 屬性。The following code example shows how to access the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/CS/processmodelsection.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/VB/processmodelsection.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MinWorkerThreads { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 CLR 執行緒集區中每個 CPU 之背景工作執行緒的最小數目。

span.span: Gets or sets the minimum number of worker threads per CPU in the CLR thread pool.

value.span: CLR 執行緒集區中每個 CPU 之背景工作執行緒的最小數目

span.span: The minimum number of worker threads per CPU in the CLR thread pool

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何存取 屬性。The following code example shows how to access the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/CS/processmodelsection.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/VB/processmodelsection.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Password { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，表示用於 Windows 識別的密碼。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the password to use for the Windows identity.
The password to use.
The default value is AutoGenerate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性必須搭配屬性。The property must be used with the property. 存在時，這些屬性值會造成工作者處理序，以設定的 Windows 身分識別來執行。When present, these property values cause the worker process to run with the configured Windows identity. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何存取 屬性。The following code example shows how to access the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/CS/processmodelsection.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/VB/processmodelsection.vb#20)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan PingFrequency { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，表示時間間隔，ISAPI 擴充功能以這個時間間隔 Ping 背景工作處理序，以判斷它是否在執行。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the time interval at which the ISAPI extension pings the worker process to determine whether it is running.
The defining the time interval.
The default is 30 seconds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 工作者處理序重新啟動 （退回） 如果之後無法執行間隔已過期。The worker process is restarted (bounced) if it is not running after the interval has expired. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何存取 屬性。The following code example shows how to access the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/CS/processmodelsection.cs#13)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/VB/processmodelsection.vb#13)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan PingTimeout { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，表示在其後重新啟動沒有回應之背景工作處理序的時間間隔。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the time interval after which a non-responsive worker process is restarted.
The defining the time interval.
The default is 5 seconds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ISAPI 擴充程式 ping 工作者處理序在間隔。The ISAPI extensions ping the worker process at the interval. 如果工作者處理序內沒有回應間隔內，處理程序重新啟動。If the worker process does not respond within the interval, the process is restarted. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何存取 屬性。The following code example shows how to access the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#14](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/CS/processmodelsection.cs#14)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#14](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/VB/processmodelsection.vb#14)]

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property Properties As ConfigurationPropertyCollection
public: property int RequestLimit { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，表示回收背景工作處理序之前所允許的要求數目。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the number of requests allowed before a worker process is recycled.
The number of allowed requests.
The default is Infinite.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果超過要求數目，ASP.NET 會自動啟動新的工作者處理序來取代目前的金鑰。If the number of requests is exceeded, ASP.NET automatically launches a new worker process to take the place of the current one. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 屬性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/CS/processmodelsection.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/VB/processmodelsection.vb#8)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int RequestQueueLimit { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，表示佇列中允許的要求數目。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the number of requests allowed in the queue.

value.span: 允許加入佇列的要求數目。

span.span: The number of requests allowed to be queued.
The default is 5000.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果超過允許的佇列中要求的數目時，ASP.NET 會開始傳回"503-伺服器忙碌中 」 錯誤，以新的要求。If the number of requests allowed in the queue is exceeded, ASP.NET begins returning "503 – Server Too Busy" errors to new requests. 當達到此限制時，系統正在運作不正常的狀況。When this limit is reached, the system is operating in abnormal conditions. 這可能是發生問題的徵兆或，有可能，只在高負載。This might be a symptom of a malfunction or, maybe, just high load. 重新啟動 （彈回） 工作者處理序可能會變得以防發生其他問題的唯一方式。Restarting (bouncing) the worker process might become the only way to prevent further problems. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 屬性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/CS/processmodelsection.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/VB/processmodelsection.vb#10)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan ResponseDeadlockInterval { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，表示背景工作處理序進行回應的時間間隔。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the time interval for the worker process to respond.
The defining the interval.
The default is 3 minutes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果沒有要求排入佇列，而且如果有回應所定義的時間間隔內重新啟動處理程序。The process is restarted if there are queued requests and if there has not been a response during the time interval that is defined by . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 屬性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#17](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/CS/processmodelsection.cs#17)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#17](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/VB/processmodelsection.vb#17)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan ResponseRestartDeadlockInterval { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };

summary.span: 不能再使用。

span.span: No longer used.
Not applicable.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性不再使用 ASP.NET，並提供回溯相容性。This property is no longer used by ASP.NET and is provided for backward compatibility only. 如果它已存在於組態檔中，它不會造成組態錯誤。It will not cause a configuration error if it is already present in a configuration file. 當發生死結狀況時的回收所有現在受到屬性。All recycling in the event of a deadlock condition is now controlled by the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何存取 屬性。The following code example shows how to access the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/CS/processmodelsection.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/VB/processmodelsection.vb#11)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int RestartQueueLimit { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，表示等待新背景工作處理序開始處理要求時，由 ISAPI 加入佇列的要求最大數目。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the maximum number of requests queued by the ISAPI while waiting for a new worker process to start handling the requests.
The number of requests queued.
The default is 10.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當超過這個限制時，用戶端要求會收到 503 錯誤，直到準備好的工作者處理序。When this limit is exceeded, a client request will receive a 503 error until the worker process is ready. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何存取 屬性。The following code example shows how to access the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/CS/processmodelsection.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/VB/processmodelsection.vb#9)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ServerErrorMessageFile { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，表示發生嚴重錯誤時必須使用其內容的檔案。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the file whose content must be used when a fatal error occurs.

value.span: 發生嚴重錯誤時使用之檔案的路徑。

span.span: The path of the file used when a fatal error occurs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會使用其內容，而不是預設的伺服器無法使用訊息檔案。The file whose content is used instead of the default Server Unavailable message. 檔案位置可以是相對或絕對檔案路徑。The file location can be a relative or an absolute file path. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 屬性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#28](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/CS/processmodelsection.cs#28)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#28](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/VB/processmodelsection.vb#28)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan ShutdownTimeout { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，表示允許背景工作處理序關閉的時間。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the time allowed for the worker process to shut down.
The defining the interval.
The default is 5 seconds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性會指定允許本身正常關閉工作者處理序的分鐘數。This property specifies the number of minutes allowed for the worker process to shut itself down gracefully. 當逾時過期時，ASP.NET 關閉工作者處理序強制。When the timeout expires, ASP.NET shuts down the worker process forcibly. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 屬性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/CS/processmodelsection.cs#15)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#15](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/VB/processmodelsection.vb#15)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan Timeout { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，表示 ASP.NET 啟動新背景工作處理序之前的分鐘數。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the number of minutes until ASP.NET launches a new worker process.
The defining the interval.
The default is Infinite.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 會啟動新的工作者處理序來取代目前的金鑰。ASP.NET launches a new worker process to take the place of the current one. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 屬性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/CS/processmodelsection.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/VB/processmodelsection.vb#10)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ UserName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，表示 Windows 識別的使用者名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the user name for a Windows identity.
The user name.
The default value is Machine.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果有的話，定義不同的預設程序使用 Windows 身分識別。If present, the defines a Windows identity different from that of the default process. 這個身分識別用來執行 ASP.NET 工作者處理序。This identity is used to run the ASP.NET worker process. 根據預設，設為特殊值機器，且名為 ASP.NET 安裝時自動建立的 ASPNET 使用者帳戶下執行此程序。By default, is set to the special value Machine, and the process runs under a user account named ASPNET that is created automatically when ASP.NET is installed. 屬性必須搭配屬性。The property must be used with the property. 存在時，這些屬性值會造成工作者處理序，以設定的 Windows 身分識別來執行。When present, these property values cause the worker process to run with the configured Windows identity. > [!NOTE] > 如果屬性設定為系統，以自動產生的密碼時，它定義為系統管理員帳戶執行程序，並可讓所有具有完整系統管理權限的程序下執行的 ASP.NET 使用者程式碼的實體。If the property is set to System, with the password AutoGenerate, it defines an entity that runs the process as an administrative account and allows all ASP.NET user code running under the process to have full administrative privileges. 因此，請密切注意到，請在此情況下，允許的權限。So, pay close attention to this case, for the permissions allowed. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何存取 屬性。The following code example shows how to access the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#19](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/CS/processmodelsection.cs#19)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#19](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/VB/processmodelsection.vb#19)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool WebGarden { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，讓可使用的 CPU 執行背景工作處理序。

span.span: Gets or sets a value enabling the available CPUs to run the worker processes.

value.span: 如果 用於將背景工作處理序對應至有資格的 CPU 編號，則為 ，如果忽略 則為 。

span.span: , if is used to map the worker processes to the number of eligible CPUs; if is ignored.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性必須搭配屬性。The property must be used with the property. 如果屬性設定為`false`、屬性會被忽略，只有一個背景工作處理序執行。If the property is set to `false`, the attribute is ignored and only one worker process runs. > [!NOTE] > 多處理器的 Web 伺服器稱為 「 Web 處理序區 」。A multiprocessor Web server is called a Web garden. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何存取 屬性。The following code example shows how to access the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#24](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/CS/processmodelsection.cs#24)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#24](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/VB/processmodelsection.vb#24)]
